messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] Digest Number 3228
messages.msgSnippet: In a message dated 4/6/03 1:57:50 AM Central Daylight Time, Unschooling-dotcom@yahoogroups.com writes:
messages.messageBody:
In a message dated 4/6/03 1:57:50 AM Central Daylight Time,
Unschooling-dotcom@yahoogroups.com writes:

<< We in Pensacola, over by Navy Blvd and Barrancas (Warrington area). Is
your group the Pensacola Unschooling group, or are you part of another
one? >>

Yeah, pensacolaunschoolers.com is our website.
Have we met?
I have a hard time remembering names at first, too many people coming and
going!!
We have the resource day at Bayview every Wed.

Ren
"The sun is shining--the sun is shining. That is the magic. The flowers are
growing--the roots are stirring. That is the magic. Being alive is the
magic--being strong is the magic The magic is in me--the magic is in
me....It's in every one of us."

----Frances Hodgson Burnett
